Sentencas: A new system which combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) and based on a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a LiBr absorption chiller and water tank is investigated.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: The influence of the working conditions of the SOFC on its steady-state and dynamic performances are studied.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the effects of working conditions of the stack and absorption chillers on multi-criteria assessments are also studied.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: The result shows that the operating temperature and current density can greatly affect the performance of the stack and system, which can also be influenced by the working conditions of the absorption chiller simultaneously.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: Increasing the operating temperature can greatly increase the electrical power, and the thermal power will be reduced correspondingly.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: Increasing the mass flows of the cooling, chilled and hot waters increase the cooling power and coefficient of performance (COP), thereby reducing the heating power.
Titulo: 4E analysis of a SOFC-CCHP system with a LiBr absorption chiller
